job description:
Job Title: Scientist
Location: North Chicago, IL 60064
Duration: 12 Months

Key Responsibilities:
  • Day to day duties will involve independently running the ARCHITECT instrument in research mode.
  • Also taking direction to build prototype assays at the bench.
  • Looking for someone who can take direction, follow a protocol, and move through it quickly.
  • Designs and conducts experiments, accomplishes established milestones and summarizes data, interprets, results and draws conclusions.
  • Participates in lab safety.
  • Documentation: Appropriately documents experimental procedures and results according to established guidelines
  • Demonstrated experience with data analysis – Excel, JMP, Prism Graphpad
  • Must demonstrate above average computer skills including instrumentation specific software, and proficiency in Microsoft office (excel)
  • Must demonstrate strong communication and critical thinking skills.
  • Ability to work independently as well as part of a team
  • Ideal candidate will be self-motivated, detail-orientated, and able to multi-task looking for people with science background (molecular biology) and/ or experience using the ARCHITECT
